projectGridLines.title: Generative AI powered platform for private company analysis
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Generative AI powered platform for private company analysis 

Description: Build a platform using generative AI to  

  • Provide a conversational interface to private company data using generative AI. 
  • Use a variety of cutting-edge AI models and develop additional models for the platform
  • Ingest and process data from various sources such as MCA filings, news and internally sourced data and store it in a manner that can be easily consumed by the generative AI engine. 
  • Integrate with web search capabilities
  • Create a high quality user interface with rich user experience

Skill sets: LLM, Generative AI, ReactJS / Javascript, Python, AWS, Vector Databases 

Expected learning:  

  • Generative AI & other AI

o   GPT, Claude 

o   Open source LLMs 

o   Classification, Named Entity Recognition

  • Data Engineering 

o   Robust pipeline to ingest vast amounts of data. 

o   Observability â€“ Alerting and monitoring of the pipeline. 

o   Vector databases

  • User Interface creation
  • Designing systems for large scale 
  • Designing a cloud native platform 

Specific courses required for project execution:   

We are looking for  

  • One frontend engineer (ReactJS / NextJS / Typescript) 
  • Two backend engineers (Python / Golang) 
  • One data science engineer
